title: Stuffed Chicken wraped in Bacon BBQ Melt
ingredients: ['2 large Chicken breasts', '4 rashers of bacon', '100g mushrooms', '1 medium sized onion', '1 clove of garlic', '1/2 can of chopped tomatoes', '4 tablespoons of bbq sauce', '1 knob of butter', '1 tablespoon of oil', '1 teaspoon of dried italian herbs', '150 g of chedder cheese']
